Be a Part of Our Event

Join the vibrant community of Reimagine Food Fest and showcase your culinary talents and cultural crafts to a wide audience in New York City. Whether you’re a seasoned chef, a local artisan, or a small business owner, we invite you to be part of this exciting culinary celebration.

Apply Now

Why Join Us?

Reimagine Food Fest is not just a festival; it's an opportunity to grow your business and connect with other like-minded individuals in the industry. By joining us, you'll benefit from:

  • Extensive exposure to a diverse and engaged audience
  • A platform to showcase your products and culinary skills
  • Networking opportunities with other vendors and businesses
  • Increased visibility and promotion through our marketing channels

Vendor Requirements

We welcome a variety of vendors who offer quality Asian-inspired foods, beverages, and culturally relevant goods. To maintain the highest standards for our festival, all applicants must meet the following criteria:

  • Must offer products or services aligned with Asian cultures
  • Compliance with all local health and safety regulations
  • Commitment to professionalism and customer service
  • Ability to handle logistics and operations for large-scale events

How to Apply

To apply to be a vendor at Reimagine Food Fest, please follow the steps below:

  1. Complete the online application form with your business details and what you intend to offer at the festival.
  2. Submit any necessary supporting documents, such as menus, product lists, and certifications.
  3. Wait for our team to review your application. We will contact you to discuss further details and next steps.

If you have any questions about the application process or need more information, please do not hesitate to contact us.

Apply Now

Stay Connected

Stay updated on all the latest news and announcements from Reimagine Food Fest. Follow us on social media and sign up for our newsletter to receive exclusive offers, event updates, and behind-the-scenes insights.
